appContext: This is a example for the app testing OpenAI to translate and update translation files

welcomeScreen.context: This screen is the screen of the app to welcome the user
welcomeScreen.title: Welcome to the app
welcomeScreen.description: This is a description for the welcome screen of the app

mainScreen.context: This screen is the main screen of the test app
mainScreen.title: Main screen of the app
mainScreen.description: This is a description for the main screen to test the translation of the app in different languages

component.context: This is a component to test the translation of the app

button.context: This is a button to open the modal of the app
button.title: open the unique modal of the test app
button.description: you can open the modal by pressing on the button

input.context: This is an input to type the name of the user
input.title: Family name

common.context: This is a common context for the app

text.context: This is a text to test the translation of the app

unit.context: Localize the unit according to the language of the file

error.context: This is a context for the error of the app

message.context: This is a message to test the translation of the app

successMessages.context: This is a context for the success messages of the app
successMessages.Cancel: The message has been canceled successfully
